front.title: Definition of Managed Objects for the Neighborhood Discovery Protocol

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB)for use with network management protocols in the Internet community.In particular, it describes objects for configuring aspects of theNeighborhood Discovery Protocol (NHDP) process on a router. The NHDPMIB also reports state information, performance information andnotifications. This additional state and performance information isuseful to management stations troubleshooting neighbor discoveryproblems.
